page.title: 18Dores/Abriachan_Fish
page.content: Trout are similar to salmon but have larger mouths and their fins are different.Both types live in Loch Ness.There are two kinds of trout,brown trout and sea trout.Brown trout do not migrate,but sea trout migrate like salmon and so are often wrongly called salmon_trout. The young sea trout hatch in rivers,where they remain for two or more years.During this time they are called parr. Later,they are called smolt and they migrate.They return to spawn,which they may do two or three times in their lifetime.
